body:
Comment 2: 
In the tip release, ReadDir is in ioutil "io/ioutil". See below:

package main
import (
	"fmt";
	ioutil "io/ioutil";
)
func main() {
	dirs, err := ioutil.ReadDir("abc");
	if err != nil {
		fmt.Println("Error reading dir: ", "abc", err);
	} else {
		for i, d := range dirs {
			fmt.Println(i , d);
	    }
	}
}
